findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: Contract Owner is able to transfer tokens from user's address

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to increase fees beyond a reasonable percentage of 25%

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to increase the liquidity taken by the developer's wallet beyond a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to prevent specific wallets from selling tokens.
